MCGOWAN / STILLER / VIRGO / ALBA / BARRYMORE / LEE / DEPP




(McGowan jump=
s over the rapids of Windlord but is struck in the left side by Termitron's=
 5 shots. She fires a missile at Termitron and 1 at the ground beneath him.=
 [If he's on the ground.])



(Stiller is hit by the 5 shots in the back. H=
e growls and ignores Termitron.)



(Virgo avoids the rapids and fires 10 b=
ullets from her machine gun at Termitron.)



(Alba is struck by the shots =
in her stomach. She growls and fires 7 shots at Termitron.)



(Barrymore i=
s struck by 3 of the shots but ducks the other 2. She fires 3 laser beams a=
t Windlord.)



(Lee avoids the shots and pulls out his rifle. He fires 2 s=
hots at Windlord along with a fireball.)



(Depp is hit in his chest by th=
e rapids and thrusts his katana at Nightlight's right shoulder...)

  -----=
 Original Message ----- 
  From: airly2000@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogro=
ups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, July 11, 2001 7:17 PM
  Subject: Chivtrons batt=
le


  Termitron/Nightlight/Windlord

  Termitron::

  Termitron continued =
attacking at his enemies while he avoided their 
  attacks; he shot 5 shots=
 against McGowan, 5 against Stiller, 10 
  against Virgo, and 5 against Alb=
a.

  Nightlight::


  Nightlight quickly moved backwards while she used he=
r left wing to 
  cover herself, Depp's struck made a wound in Nightlight's=
 wings, she 
  moved quickly her wing and fired 25 energy balls against Dep=
p. She 
  fell fear, she was wondering if she and her friends would survive=
.
   

  Windlord::


  Windlord dogged most of the Barrymore's, Lee's shot=
s and he avoided 
  McGowan's missile; he fired 5 shots against Barrymore, =
5 against Lee 
  and 15 against  McGowan
